name: notepad
content:
notepad noun [C]
(PAPER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a set of sheets of plain or lined paper, joined at the top edge, for writing on: He took out a notepad and pretended to write. a plain/ruled notepad a reporter's notepad
Creative Crop/DigitalVision/GettyImages

notepad noun [C]
(COMPUTING)
a computer program used for making notes: I always copy what I say and paste it in a notepad before posting it. There is a built-in notepad which lets you attach your own thoughts, ideas and memos to a specific map.
(also notepad computer) a type of very small computer that you can carry easily. This type of computer is no longer commonly used. : She was repairing an Amstrad notepad computer from the 1990s.
